title: Check out the first pics from Justin and Hailey Bieber’s second wedding
text:
Well, it doesn't get anymore official than this.

Interested in Justin Bieber? Add Justin Bieber as an interest to stay up to date on the latest Justin Bieber news, video, and analysis from ABC News. Add Interest

Justin Bieber took to Instagram Tuesday morning to announce that he's officially married (for the second time) and that his bride, Hailey Baldwin, is beautiful.

"My bride is" fire, he wrote.

In the post, he attached two photo booth-type pics with the caption, "The Biebers."

This post comes after tons of speculation Monday that the duo were tying the knot again in South Carolina.

Bieber added more fuel to the rumor fire when he posted a beautiful gold Audemars Piguet watch with the caption, "Got my self a lil wedding gift."

While Hailey has yet to post about the wedding, her sister Alaia shared photos as the festivities began.

"Let the games begin," she wrote alongside ring emojis.

A few days ago, Bieber himself also posted a throwback with Hailey, her parents, Stephen Baldwin and Kennya Baldwin, and his mother, Pattie Mallette.

"Me and the wife! and the in laws !!" he captioned the photo. "Thanks for lettin ur daughter marry a savage like me."

The duo confirmed that they had been officially married late last year and earlier this year spoke to Vogue about married life.

"Marriage is very hard," Hailey said, adding, "I love him very much. I have loved him for a long time."
description: Justin and Hailey Bieber made it official Tuesday morning with a post after their wedding titled
